directions: Combine vegetables, water, olive oil, salt and pepper in a 3-4 quart crockpot and stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 7-9 hours or until vegetables are tender when pierced with a fork.
ingredients: 1 lb. baby carrots or regular carrots, cut into chunks
4 russet potatoes, scrubbed, cut into 1-1/2" pieces
title: Crockpot Roasted Vegetables
